content.webTitle: Lonely chairs at CERN | Jon Butterworth | Life & Physics

fields.headline: Lonely chairs at CERN
fields.bodyText: This collection of moody furniture photos has started doing the rounds, and I feel it would be remiss of me not to share it with you. I love it. Having heard some bloke try to justify his creepy women-on-tube-eating-food facebook page this morning on BBC Radio Four's premier news programme, I confidently expect to hear how this "lonely chair" business is proper art tomorrow on all major outlets. So I thought the Guardian should get in. It's art. And the furniture doesn't mind. (Because it's furniture, lads. That's the difference.) More pictures seem to be appearing on the #lonelychairsatcern hashtag. And here. Jon Butterworth’s book, Smashing Physics, is out on 22 May. You can order it now!
